channel.title: Webclient little help - please reply if you dont know!
channel.description: [b]Exception in thread "Thread-10" java.security.AccessControlException: access denied (java.io.FilePermission C:\.bismilah_file_store_32 read) at java.security.AccessControlContext.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkRead(Unknown Source) at java.io.File.exists(Unknown Source) at sign.signlink.findcachedir(signlink.java:243) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:50) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Error connecting to server. java.security.AccessControlException: access denied (java.net.SocketPermission tigerden.uppit.com:80 connect,resolve) at java.security.AccessControlContext.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkConnect(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2SecurityManager.checkConnect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.<init>(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.New(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.New(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getNewHttpClient(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.connect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getHeaderField(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLConnection.getHeaderFieldInt(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLConnection.getContentLength(Unknown Source) at client.downloadcache(client.java:3793) at client.method67(client.java:3891) at client.method6(client.java:7682) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:45) at client.run(client.java:5139) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/b] i get this error when i load up my webclient

item.title: Webclient little help - please reply if you dont know!
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Hey since this is client related I may not know the problem, but have you read

Exception in thread "Thread-10" java.security.AccessControlException: access denied (java.io.FilePermission C:\.bismilah_file_store_32 read)

I don’t think you have access to C:\ or the directory doesn’t exist.

Read full topic
item.source: Webclient little help - please reply if you dont know!
